name: smokehouse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a building where meat, fish, or cheese is preserved using smoke from burning wood: They left the salmon inside the smokehouse for three days. We queued outside the smokehouse to get some smoked herrings for our supper.
More examplesFewer examplesOur local fishmonger has a smokehouse at the back of his premises.There were strings of sausages hanging down from the roof of the smokehouse.She set up her business in an abandoned smokehouse on the edge of the village.
